description: Roasted sweet potato cubes and black beans piled into warm tortillas with lime crema, paired with charred street-corn salad.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Sweet Potato & Black Bean Tacos, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Roasted sweet potato cubes and black beans piled into warm tortillas with lime crema, paired with charred street-corn salad.. Scene: mexican-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: A captivating close-up of two Sweet Potato & Black Bean Tacos, generously piled with golden-edged sweet potatoes and glistening black beans, nestled in warm tortillas with a luscious swirl of lime crema. Alongside, a vibrant dollop of smoky charred street-corn salad. Bathed in soft, luminous natural light, a shallow depth of field emphasizes fresh cilantro leaves, a zesty lime wedge, and delicate wisps of steam, evoking irresistible homemade comfort.
